name: Running Late | Ludum Dare 48
description:
Running Late | Ludum Dare 48

You are running late to meet your friend and just realized you don’t know where you left your stuff!!! You figure it’s probably where it always is… lost deep in the couch.

Find your stuff before time runs out!

Controls

  • Click to search the couch.
  • Click and Drag to grab the items.

Game created by Andreia and Colombo for Ludum Dare 48 for the theme "Deeper and Deeper".

Background music from PlayOnLoop.com
